section_title: Power of Treasury and Postmaster-General to carry out arrangements with Cable and Wireless Limited.
section_text: 1 1 The Treasury may accept any fully paid shares in Cable and Wireless Limited made over to it as aforesaid, and any dividends or other sums received by the Treasury in respect of those shares (other than any part of any dividends on any shares transferred to the Treasury which the Treasury may be liable to pay to the transferors of those shares) shall be paid into the Exchequer. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
3 This Act may be cited as the Imperial Telegraphs Act 1938.
